docs.snippet: A crew from the popular BBC television program "Top Gear" has left an Argentine province after being denied permission to film by local authorities who said one of its cars had a license plate alluding to the Falklands War between Britain and the ...

headline.main: 'Top Gear' Crew Escorted Out of Argentina Province
headline.print_headline: 'Top Gear' Crew Escorted Out of Argentina Province

docs.lead_paragraph: A crew from the popular BBC television program "Top Gear" has left an Argentine province after being denied permission to film by local authorities who said one of its cars had a license plate alluding to the Falklands War between Britain and the South American country.

docs.snippet: Bank of Japan policymakers meeting next week will start debating how to justify maintaining their rosy inflation forecasts even as a slew of weak data will likely force them to cut their economic growth projections later this month....

headline.main: BOJ to Stand Pat as Weak Data Tests Its Rosy Price Forecast
headline.print_headline: BOJ to Stand Pat as Weak Data Tests Its Rosy Price Forecast

docs.lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan policymakers meeting next week will start debating how to justify maintaining their rosy inflation forecasts even as a slew of weak data will likely force them to cut their economic growth projections later this month.
